label: responseReasonCode
comment: A code specifying a response reason for this exchanged document.
The code specifying the response reason of this document line.
The code specifying the response reason of this subordinate trade line item.

domainIncludes.comment: A collection of data for a line on a piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence.
A collection of data for a piece of written, printed or electronic matter that is exchanged between two or more parties.
A collection of information specific to a subordinate item being used or reported on for trade purposes.
